text: Moscow Does Not Believe in Tears () (this is an old Russian proverb) is a 1980 Russian romantic drama movie directed by Vladimir Menshov and starring Vera Alentova, Irina Muravyova, Raisa Ryazanova, Aleksey Batalov, Aleksandr Fatyushin, Oleg Tabakov. It was distributed by Mosfilm. ==Other websites== * * Category:1980 romantic drama movies Category:Russian romance movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:Movies directed by Vladimir Menshov
title: Moscow Does Not Believe in Tears
